column5: My quaint bungalow house is on a quiet street just minutes from downtown and all the great attractions of downtown SA (zoo, brackenridge park, Trinity, UIW, Alamo Heights).   2BR home is updated and has everything you need - kitchen, living room, dining area, mud room with washer/dryer.   Large, green lot with a front porch and back porch with room to BBQ or play.   Kid friendly if needbe.
column8: Charming Bungalow just minutes from downtown
